#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

#define S(x)					scanf("%d",&x)
#define INC(i,a,b)				for(int i=a;i<b;++i)
#define REP(i,n)				INC(i,0,n)

const int MAX_N = 1e3;
int t, n;
int L[MAX_N][3], P[MAX_N], DP[MAX_N];

int dist(int,int);

int main() {
  S(t);
  while(t--) {
    S(n);
    REP(i,n) {
      REP(j,3) S(L[i][j]);
      if(i) {
	P[i] = P[i-1] + dist(i-1,i);
	DP[i] = P[i-1];
      }
      else {
	P[i] = 0;
	DP[i] = 0;
      }
    }
    
    INC(i,1,n) INC(j,1,i) DP[i] = min(DP[i],DP[j]+dist(j-1,i)+P[i-1]-P[j]);
    
    int ans = DP[n-1];
    INC(i,1,n) ans = min(ans,DP[i]+P[n-1]-P[i]);
    
    printf("%d\n",ans);
  }
}

int dist(int a, int b) {
  int ans = 0;
  REP(i,3) ans += abs(L[a][i]-L[b][i]);
  return ans;
}
